Privacy Policy

Last updated: December 2025

Stress Buster Simulator respects your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how information is handled when you use our application.

Information Collection and Use

Stress Buster Simulator does not collect any personally identifiable information such as your name, email address, phone number, or precise location.

The app does not require users to create an account or log in.

Third-Party Services

The app uses third-party services to support advertisements and app functionality.

We use Google AdMob to display banner, interstitial, and rewarded ads.

Google AdMob may collect limited information such as:
• Device information
• Advertising ID
• Approximate location
• Ad interaction data

This information is used only to improve ad relevance and performance.

Advertisements

Stress Buster Simulator displays ads to keep the app free to use.

Rewarded ads are optional and shown only when the user chooses to watch them.

Children’s Privacy

Stress Buster Simulator does not knowingly collect personal information from children under the age of 13.

If you believe that a child has provided personal data, please contact us and appropriate action will be taken.

Data Security

We do not store, share, or process personal user data on our servers.

Changes to This Privacy Policy

This Privacy Policy may be updated from time to time. Any changes will be reflected on this page.

Contact Us

If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

stressbustersimulator@gmail.com
